00035 # define H_DbCore

00042 # include <PLASMA/Token.hh>

00044 namespace TREX {
00045   namespace europa {
00046 
00047     class DbCore :public EUROPA::PlanDatabaseListener {
00048       typedef std::map<EUROPA::ObjectId, EUROPA::TokenId> state_map;
00049     public:
00050       explicit DbCore(EuropaReactor &owner);
00051       ~DbCore();
00052 
00053       void initialize(EUROPA::ConstrainedVariableId const &clk);
00054       // public reactor interfaces
00055       // - internal timelines
00056       void set_internal(EUROPA::ObjectId const &obj);
00057       void doNotify();
00058       void recall(EUROPA::eint const &key);
00059 
00060       // - external timelines
00061       void set_external(EUROPA::ObjectId const &obj);
00062       void notify(state_map::value_type const &obs);
00063       void doDispatch();      
00064 
00065       // synchronization 
00066       bool synchronize();
00067       bool relax(bool aggressive = false);
00068       void archive();
00069 
00070       // deliberation
00071       bool step();
00072       
00073     private:
00074       typedef std::list<EUROPA::TokenId>    sequence_type;
00075       typedef sequence_type::const_iterator seq_iter;
00076       static std::pair<seq_iter, seq_iter> find_after(EUROPA::TimelineId const &tl,
00077                                                 TREX::transaction::TICK now);
00078       void enforce_duration(EUROPA::TokenId const &tok);
00079       void force_update(EUROPA::TokenId const &active, EUROPA::TokenId const &merged);
00080 
00081       bool update_externals();
00082 
00083       bool propagate();
00084       bool resolve(size_t &steps);
00085       bool update_internals(size_t &steps);
00086 
00087       bool process_agenda(EUROPA::TokenSet agenda, size_t &steps);
00088 
00089       // connection info to TREX
00090       EuropaReactor &m_reactor;
00091 
00092       state_map m_internals;
00093       state_map m_externals;
00094       state_map m_new_obs;
00095 
00096       bool is_goal(EUROPA::TokenId const &tok) const {
00097        return m_goals.end()!=m_goals.find(tok);
00098       }
00099       bool remove_goal(EUROPA::TokenId const &tok, bool doRestrict=true);
00100       bool reset_goal(EUROPA::TokenId const &tok, bool aggressive);
00101 
00102       EUROPA::TokenSet m_goals;
00103       EUROPA::TokenSet m_recalled;
00104       EUROPA::TokenSet m_observations;
00105 
00106       void remove_observation(EUROPA::TokenId const &tok);
00107       
00108       // europa callbacks
00109       void notifyAdded(EUROPA::TokenId const &token);
00110       void notifyRemoved(EUROPA::TokenId const &Token);
00111       
00112       void notifyActivated(EUROPA::TokenId const &token);
00113       void notifyDeactivated(EUROPA::TokenId const &token);
00114       
00115       void notifyMerged(EUROPA::TokenId const &token);
00116       void notifySplit(EUROPA::TokenId const &token);
00117       
00118       void notifyCommitted(EUROPA::TokenId const &token);
00119       void notifyRejected(EUROPA::TokenId const &token);
00120       void notifyTerminated(EUROPA::TokenId const &token);
00121 
00122       void process_pending();
00123 
00124       EUROPA::TokenSet m_pending;      
00125 
00126       void add_to_agenda(EUROPA::TokenId const &token);
00127       void remove_from_agenda(EUROPA::TokenId const &token);
00128 
00129       EUROPA::TokenSet m_facts_agenda;      
00130       EUROPA::TokenSet m_agenda;
00131       EUROPA::TokenSet m_terminated;
00132 
00133       EUROPA::ConstrainedVariableId m_clk;
00134     };
